"New Vocab:
sume (mature)

kuto (school)

daw (person)

twi (reorder prefix)

Rules:
twi reorders adjective-noun compounding.

Default: left-to-right compounding.

twi swaps interpretation.

Nouns can compound.

e marks predicate.

No i for “to be”.

Sentence Sample:
sume twikutodaw.
Question:
What does this mean vs. sumekutodaw?"
Target Output: "Adult student (adult + school-person) vs. college student (adult-school + person)."
